name: LyfPlus
description:
LyfPlus provides a software infrastructure for health facilities to set up custom digital health products that suit their patient needs. The module-based architecture allows products like telehealth, EHRs and e-pharmacies to be developed, deployed and scaled independently.

Health facilities can;

1. Quickly set up and launch solutions across the patient value chain at $0 initial cost.
2. Use data insights to predict patient dynamics and enhance the quality of their services.
3.
